resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::RequestValidator`` resource sets up basic validation rules for incoming requests to your API. For more information, see [Enable Basic Request Validation for an API in API Gateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-method-request-validation.html) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

type.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

properties.name: ValidateRequestBody
properties.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate a request body according to the configured Model schema.

type.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate a request body according to the configured Model schema.

properties.name: ValidateRequestParameters
properties.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate request parameters (``true``) or not (``false``).

type.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate request parameters (``true``) or not (``false``).
